@graph.headline: Update Shopify Image Alt Text Attributes (tags) In Bulk With OpizenAI
@graph.description: Learn how to use OptizenAI to automatically update Shopify product image alt text attributes in bulk using OpenAI Vision technology.

@graph.name: How to Update Shopify Image Alt Text with OptizenAI
@graph.description: Step-by-step process to update image alt attributes for Shopify products using AI

step.name: Navigate to Image Tab
step.text: Navigate to the 'Image' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update images. Use the check boxes to select the products. Click 'Next'.

step.name: Configure Schedule Settings
step.text: Give the schedule a name. This is for your reference only. Then select from the dropdown, auto, low or high detail settings based on your image processing needs.

step.name: Select and Configure Prompt
step.text: Select the prompt you want to use from drop down under the Image ALT prompt field. You can choose any of the provided prompts, edit the provided prompts, or write your own. Be sure to check the box for 'Update this section'. Then click Proceed.

step.name: Execute and Review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update.

@graph.name: Image Alt Text Prompt Examples
@graph.description: Collection of AI prompts for generating image alt text

item.name: Descriptive Alt Text Prompt (300 characters)
item.description: Create a descriptive alt text for this image. The length of the alt tag should be no more than 300 characters. Ensure the alt text is descriptive but concise.

item.name: Simple Alt Text Prompt (3 words)
item.description: Create a simple alt text for this image. The length of the alt tag should be 3 words.

item.name: Simple Alt Text Prompt (5 words)
item.description: Create a simple alt text for this image. The length of the alt tag should be 5 words.

item.name: Descriptive Alt Text Prompt (10 words)
item.description: Create a descriptive alt text for this image. The length of the alt tag should be 10 words. Ensure the alt text is descriptive but concise.

item.name: Brand-Inclusive Alt Text Prompt
item.description: Create a descriptive alt text for this image. The length of the alt tag should be 10 words. Ensure the alt text is descriptive but concise. Ensure you include the brand: [Brand]
